blogGet.doc: Returns a blog public data. If the call is authenticated and username is not provided, the method returns data about the current user's Skyrock blog.

output_format.doc: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.

blogGetPost.doc: Returns an user's blog post. Only online posts will be returned, unless authenticated user is its creator.

output_format.doc: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.

blogListOfflinePosts.doc: Returns current user's blog posts list (offline only), paginated.

with_secret.doc: Allow authenticated blog owner to show secret posts (false by default).

output_format.doc: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.

blogListPictures.doc: Returns the list of pictures from all blog's articles, paginated (35 pictures per page).

blogListPosts.doc: Returns an user's blog posts list (online only), paginated (10 articles per page).

with_secret.doc: Allow authenticated blog owner to show secret posts (false by default).

output_format.doc: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.

blogNewPostMedia.doc: Associates media with a blog post.

blogSet.doc: Sets authenticated user's blog data. Each parameter is optional, you can either set one or many at once.

generalCheckRateLimit.doc: Returns the number of remaining queries (see http://en.skyrock.com/developer/documentation/api/#request-rate-limits). Calls to this method are not counted against the limits.

messageGetThread.doc: Returns a message thread (15 messages per page).

messageListThreads.doc: Returns the authenticated user's message threads (15 threads per page).

messageSendMessage.doc: Sends a message to a single recipient.

messageSetThreadAsRead.doc: Marks a message thread as read.

newsfeedListAlertsTypes.doc: Returns descriptions of alerts types, for developer information.

newsfeedListEvents.doc: Lists events in the user's dash-board (eg. newsfeed).

events_category.doc: Events category. Possible values: own (display own events), friends (display friends' events).

newsfeedListEventsTypes.doc: Returns descriptions of events types, for developer information.

newsfeedSendAlert.doc: Sends a free text as alert to the authenticated user's alerts (notifications). The message is not localized and should be send in the user language. Unlike events, alerts are personal.

newsfeedSendEvent.doc: Sends a free text as event to the authenticated user's dash-board (eg. newsfeed). Events also appear in the dash-board of the user's friends. The message is not localized and should be send in the user language.

profileAddAlbum.doc: Adds an album to the profile.

profileAddPicture.doc: Adds a picture to the profile.

profileDeleteAlbum.doc: Deletes an empty album. Main album (id_album = 1) cannot be deleted.

profileGet.doc: Returns an user's profile public data.

output_format.doc: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.

profileGetConfig.doc: Returns settings about current user's profile.

profileGetPropertyValues.doc: Returns possible values for a given property. These properties can be set using set or set_config.

property.doc: Property name. Possible values: gender, gender_preference, looks_for, status, town, country, department, occupation, place, personality, smoker, hair_color, eye_color, height, weight, block_friends, block_honors, block_groups, block_gifts, show_visits_counter, show_comments_counter, show_kiffs_counter, show_my_websites, show_mood, display_policy, allow_share, allow_facebook_like, allow_votes, allow_kiffs, default_page, show_me_page, show_news_page, show_photos_page, show_videos_page, allow_comments.

profileListAlbums.doc: Returns the list of albums associated with a profile. Main album has id_album = 1.

profileListPictures.doc: Returns the list of pictures associated with a profile.

profileSet.doc: Sets an user's profile public data.

profileSetConfig.doc: Sets informations about a profile's (see get_property_values for possible values to set).

userAddToBestFriends.doc: Adds a friend to the best friend list. The friend user should be a friend of current user.

userAddUserToBlacklist.doc: Adds a user to the blacklist.

userGet.doc: Returns an user's public data. If the call is authenticated and username is not provided, the method returns data about the current user's Skyrock account.

userIsFriend.doc: Checks friend relation between two users.

order.doc: Results order. Possible values:- DEFAULT: default order.- ALPHA: sort alphabetically.- OLDEST_TO_NEWEST: sort by oldest to newest friends (by date of friendship).- NEWEST_TO_OLDEST: sort by newest to oldest friends (by date of friendship).- BEST_FIRST: default order, with best friends first.- BEST_LAST: default order, with best friends last.

Results order. Possible values:- DEFAULT: default order.- ALPHA: sort alphabetically.- OLDEST_TO_NEWEST: sort by oldest to newest friends (by date of friendship).- NEWEST_TO_OLDEST: sort by newest to oldest friends (by date of friendship).- BEST_FIRST: default order, with best friends first.- BEST_LAST: default order, with best friends last.

Results order. Possible values:- DEFAULT: default order.- ALPHA: sort alphabetically.- OLDEST_TO_NEWEST: sort by oldest to newest friends (by date of friendship).- NEWEST_TO_OLDEST: sort by newest to oldest friends (by date of friendship).- BEST_FIRST: default order, with best friends first.- BEST_LAST: default order, with best friends last.

userRemoveFromBestFriends.doc: Removes a friend from the best friend list. The friend user should be a best friend of current user.

userRemoveFromFriends.doc: Removes a friend from the friend list.

userRemoveUserFromBlacklist.doc: Removes a user from the blacklist.
